price: Du’a keenya kan jalqabaa malee; nuti adabamoos miti.”
arabic: إِلَّا مَوۡتَتَنَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: illā mawtatanā al-ūlā wamā naḥnu bimuʿadhabīna
